input.heading: Input data
input.description: Data uploaded by the user which describes individual case records created over time

prepared.heading: Prepared data
prepared.description: Data prepared for pattern detection by the user by removing  direct identifiers and reducing to a small number of columns, each containing a small number of categorical values

case_pattern_table.heading: Detected patterns
case_pattern_table.description: Patterns detected in the attributes of the prepared data, including the period of detection, the attribute values representing the pattern, and the number of cases that match the pattern

case_patterns.heading: Pattern reports
case_patterns.description: Example reports generated for detected patterns, including a chart showing the number of cases matching the pattern over time, and a markdown report describing the pattern
